Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet all your needs and expectations, just like it has for other satisfied customers. Given its high-quality features and benefits, we believe it's worth every penny of its original value, which is $80. Considering its exceptional quality and the value it brings, I'm offering it to you at this exclusive price. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the best at an unbeatable rate. Let's make this deal happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $80. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $80
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
